title: 1(2) of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35 of 2024), hereby orders as
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gambling Regulation Act 2024
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 

(Commencement) (No. 2) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gambling regulation act 2024 (commencement) (no 2) order 2025

title: 1(2) of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (No. 35 of 2024), hereby orders as
heading: 2. Article 2 of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (Commencement) Order
text_raw:
2. Article 2 of the Gambling Regulation Act 2024 (Commencement) Order 
2025 (S.I. No. 57 of 2025) is amended by the insertion of “2025” after “March”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Justice, 

18 March, 2025. 

ANDREW MUNRO, 

A person authorised under section 15 of the Ministers and 
Secretaries Act 1924 to authenticate the seal of the 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 21st March, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [78] 3
